page.title: 15HIGHAM'S SHOP AND LIBRARY
page.content:
HIGHAM IS SUCH A SMALL VILLAGE THAT PEOPLE HAVE TO TRAVEL IN THEIR CARS TO GET MOST OF THE THINGS THEY NEED
{THE SHOP IN HIGHAM THERE IS ONLY ONE SHOP.IT STOCKS MOST OF THE THINGS YOU CAN MENTION.THE BEST SELLERS ARE SWEETS. THE TOP TEN THINGS ARE:SWEETS,PAPERS,FRUIT + VEG ,CARDS, GROCERY,CIGARETTES,MEDICINE,FANCY GOODS,BREAD.THE WORST PRODUCT IS HABERDASHERY.
{THE LIBRARY. THE LIBRARY IS A MOBILE LIBRARY. THE MOST PEOPLE THEY CAN TAKE IN THE LIBRARY IS 40.YOU CAN JOIN ON WEDNESDAYS,ALL YOU DO IS FILL IN A FORM.THERE ARE TWO LIBRARIANS.THEIR H.Q. IS IN NELSON.THEY START AT 9:00 A.M.AND FINISH AT 5:00 P.M.
